name: angular-cli
description: This extension eases the use of the Angular cli in Visual Studio Code

angular-cli.appShell.enabled.description: Generates an app shell for running a server-side version of an app.

angular-cli.appShell.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#appShell-command

angular-cli.application.enabled.description: Generates a new basic app definition in the "projects" subfolder of the workspace.

angular-cli.application.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#application-command

angular-cli.class.enabled.description: Creates a new generic class definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.class.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#class-command

angular-cli.component.enabled.description: Creates a new generic component definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.component.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#component-command

angular-cli.directive.enabled.description: Creates a new generic directive definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.directive.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#directive-command

angular-cli.enum.enabled.description: Generates a new, generic enum definition for the given or default project.

angular-cli.enum.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#enum-command

angular-cli.guard.enabled.description: Generates a new, generic route guard definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.guard.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#guard-command

angular-cli.interceptor.enabled.description: Creates a new, generic interceptor definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.interceptor.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#interceptor-command

angular-cli.interface.enabled.description: Creates a new generic interface definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.interface.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#interface-command

angular-cli.library.enabled.description: Creates a new generic library project in the current workspace.

angular-cli.library.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#library-command

angular-cli.module.enabled.description: Creates a new generic NgModule definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.module.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#module-command

angular-cli.pipe.enabled.description: Creates a new generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.pipe.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#pipe-command

angular-cli.service.enabled.description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.service.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#service-command

angular-cli.serviceWorker.enabled.description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to create a service worker

angular-cli.serviceWorker.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#serviceWorker-command

angular-cli.webWorker.enabled.description: Creates a new generic web worker definition in the given or default project.

angular-cli.webWorker.options.markdownDescription: Add additional options to the command. For all options see https://angular.io/cli/generate#webWorker-command

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
